Machine Learning: Step-Wise

Implemented a step-wise greedy algorithm that classifies a face image as either smiling or not using 5 pairs of pixels trained on 2000 images.
Built in: Python, Numpy, Matplotlib

Web Development: Health Missions International

Created the online website for Health Missions International, a 5013-C Non-Profit that provides general health care, surgical care, and dental care to the women and children in the Indian sub-continent.
